Rotation.RotationNotes:
BM: Hunter updated for 4.3
Hold Left Alt key to Pause (allows use of traps and other spells) Hold Left Shift to Bestial Wrath (see note) Hold Left Shift to Rapid Fire (see note) Hold Left Control to Multi-Shot and to set Cobra Shot to a higher priority.
Note: holding left shift will cast BW first and not Rapid fire. If BW is on CD and your still holding shift then it will cast Rapid Fire. This is to Save the Longer CD of Rapid Fire until it is needed and still be able to use BW.
